overview: Legendary adult actress Stephanie Swift is known for her love of other women, and this video explores the private side of this exotic, gifted star. In rare behind the scenes interviews, write and director Nica Noelle delves deep into the mind of one of the adult industry's most enigmatic stars. Peek into the bedroom while Stephanie seduces the earthy Elexis Monroe in a scene that culminates in mutual mind-blowing orgasms. Come along as Mina Meow teaches a reluctant but curious Stephanie about BDSM, and follow Sinn Sage as she hunts her gorgeous prey Stephanie in an encounter that sets the stage for lesbian tribadism. Real orgasms, real passion, real interviews.
title: Stephanie Loves Girls
